product_name: Jetboil Sol Titanium Companion Cup - 0.8 Liter
long_description: The lightweight Jetboil Sol(TM) 0.8-liter Titanium Companion cup lets you expand your Jetboil cooking system without making it cumbersome. 0.8-liter titanium FluxRing(R) cooking cup features an insulating neoprene cozy to keep your food and beverages warm. FluxRing(R) heat exchanger on the bottom of the cooking cup creates excellent fuel efficiency. Bottom cover unsnaps from the cooking cup to double as a measuring cup or bowl; measuring cup comes in handy when preparing meals and hot drinks. Drink-through lid features a pour spout and strainer holes. Sol Titanium Companion cup is compatible with Jetboil Sol, Zip, Flash and PCS stoves (sold separately). Sol or Zip burner base and a 100g Jetpower isobutane-propane fuel canister (all sold separately) will fit inside the Sol Titanium Companion cup.
short_description: The lightweight Jetboil Sol(TM) 0.8-liter Titanium Companion cup lets you expand your Jetboil cooking system without making it cumbersome.
